original_text: On the day when Elkanah sacrificed, he would give portions to Peninnah his wife and to all her sons and daughters.
korean_text: 엘가나가 제사를 드리는 날에는 제물의 분깃을 그의 아내 브닌나와 그의 모든 자녀에게 주고

sentences.original_text: On the day when Elkanah sacrificed
he would give portions to Peninnah his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아내 브린나에게 몫을 주었고

sentences.original_text: and to all her sons and daughters
